cast.overview: Henry is a player skilled at seducing women. But when this veterinarian meets Lucy, a girl with a quirky problem when it comes to total recall, he realizes it's possible to fall in love all over again…and again, and again. That's because the delightful Lucy has no short-term memory, so Henry must woo her day after day until he finally sweeps her off her feet.
cast.title: 50 First Dates

cast.overview: Everyone deserves a great love story, but for 17-year-old Simon Spier, it's a little more complicated. He hasn't told his family or friends that he's gay, and he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate that he's fallen for online.
cast.title: Love, Simon

details.biography: Chantell D. Christopher was born on October 17, 1968 in Lithonia, Georgia, USA. She is an actress, known for 50 First Dates (2004), Madea Goes to Jail (2006) and Love, Simon (2018).
details.name: Chantell D. Christopher
